Html:
hey guys, I'm using HAP for WP7 to do some HTML parsing work.

But I cannot find the SelectNodes function. There is only Descendants function and it cannot understand XPath expression.

So is there any way to select nodes by XPath expression???
The current version supports wp7.0 which did not include xpath. I think now with mango xpath should be supported, I'll check into it

I have uploaded a new Nuget package that includes versions for windows phone, the one for wp7.1 includes the xpath options.

I'll be updating version control shortly
Great! And thanks a lot for the product!
Windows 7.1 still knows no System.XML.Xpath so the 7.1 lib is not working with XPath support
